Convert a DiagrammeR graph to an igraph one

Source: R/to_igraph.R
to_igraph.Rd

Convert a DiagrammeR graph to an igraph graph object.

Usage

to_igraph(graph)

Arguments

graph

A graph object of class dgr_graph.

Value

An igraph object.

Examples

# Create a random graph using the
# `add_gnm_graph()` function
graph <-
  create_graph() %>%
  add_gnm_graph(
    n = 36,
    m = 50,
    set_seed = 23)

# Confirm that `graph` is a
# DiagrammeR graph by getting
# the object's class
class(graph)
#> [1] "dgr_graph"

# Convert the DiagrammeR graph
# to an igraph object
ig_graph <- to_igraph(graph)

# Get the class of the converted
# graph, just to be certain
class(ig_graph)
#> [1] "igraph"

# Get a summary of the igraph
# graph object
summary(ig_graph)
#> IGRAPH 2ed6f34 DN-B 36 50 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), type (v/c), label (v/c), rel (e/c)
